name: After (itch) (Sajid Ali)
description:
A survival game where you can't kill your enemy.

This game is made for Hack a jam based on the theme "bad is good"

Controls :

WASD for move 

How to Play:

you Have to kill you enemy by you another enemy who will shoot you and make your highest score
